name: The Exploits of Fingers Malone
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Doug Turner - British Software / Mastertronic Ltd. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1986. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!  Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Be nible and be quick for it is up to you to collect all the money stolen in the recent bank raids. However, you will not be alone - the raiders themselves are onto you and they will try anything to stop you from uncovering their swag! After picking up all 3 keys you will then be able to unlock the safe. You only help, apart from your own skill will come from using the lifts. To call a lift press the fire button (A or B) when over a lift button and move the cursor/arrow keys up and down to move the lift from floor to floor. When you open the safe, you can head for the exit to make your getaway.

A challenging arcade game packed full of action and excitements!

Move: Cursor keys
Action: A or B

Move: Arrow keys
Action: X or Z

Fingers Malone - Mastertronic Ltd.
